participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

sub_res_mj_q01.Description: When using marijuana the first time or two, did you: Like the taste | 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Some; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = A great deal

sub_res_mj_q02.Description: When using marijuana the first time or two, did you: Cough | 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Some; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = A great deal

sub_res_mj_q03.Description: When using marijuana the first time or two, did you: Feel dizzy or light-headed | 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Some; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = A great deal
